Html:
More lovely features on the WPF Charting tool - when you hover over a pie slice (or bar), a popup shows the value and percentage.  How can you make changes to this popup to show additional or different information?

Also, if I may ask a second question - how to get the bars of a bar chart to be different colors?

Thanks in advance.

Thanks! I answer the first question here:

http://blogs.msdn.com/delay/archive/2009/05/19/chart-tweaking-made-easy-how-to-make-four-simple-color-tooltip-changes-with-silverlight-wpf-charting.aspx

And the second here:

http://blogs.msdn.com/delay/archive/2009/02/04/columns-of-a-different-color-customizing-the-appearance-of-silverlight-charts-with-re-templating-and-mvvm.aspx

Hope this helps!
